briefTitle: Safety/Efficacy of Sitagliptin in Patient w/ Type 2 Diabetes (0431-801)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient has Type 2 diabetes
* Currently taking metformin \>1500 mg/day for at least 10 weeks
* Male or female

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patient has peripheral edema
* History of type 1 diabetes
* Patient required insulin within prior 8 weeks
* Have participated or are currently participating in another study with an investigational compound or device within 12 weeks of starting this study
* Participating in a weight loss program

outcomeMeasures.title: Hemoglobin A1C (A1C) at Week 18
outcomeMeasures.description:
A1C is measured as percent. Thus, this change from baseline reflects the Week 18 A1C percent minus the Week 0 A1C percent.

The study hypothesis comparison was between sitagliptin versus placebo.

outcomeMeasures.title: Fasting Plasma Glucose (FPG) at Week 18
outcomeMeasures.description: The change from baseline is the Week 18 FPG minus the Week 0 FPG.

outcomeMeasures.title: 2-hour Post-meal Glucose (PMG) at Week 18
outcomeMeasures.description: The change from baseline is the Week 18 PMG minus the Week 0 PMG.
